params.__token: The MultiToken targeted by this factory.
params.__tokenId: The sub-token ID targeted by this factory.

returns._0: Returns the address of the deployed forwarder.

getDeployDetails().details: The target MultiToken and token ID are transient state variables      that are set during deployment.

params.__token: The target MultiToken of the forwarder.
params.__tokenId: The target token ID of the forwarder.

returns._0: The expected address of the forwarder.

ERC20LINK_HASH().notice: The hash of the bytecode of the ERC20 forwarder contract.

create(address,uint256).notice: Uses create2 to deploy a forwarder at a predictable address as         part of our ERC20 multitoken implementation.

getDeployDetails().notice: Gets the MultiToken and token ID that should be targeted by the         calling forwarder.

getForwarder(address,uint256).notice: Helper to calculate expected forwarder contract addresses.

documentation.text: @notice The transient MultiToken addressed used in deployment.
@notice The transient token ID addressed used in deployment.
@notice The hash of the bytecode of the ERC20 forwarder contract.
